Themes

Tailwind NG provides a set of pre-built themes available via the CDN and npm for your Angular application. These themes support light and dark mode by default and are built with Tailwind CSS. Because they are built with Tailwind CSS, you may no longer need to install Tailwind CSS package. But if you will have to do some customizations, I will recommend to install the Tailwind CSS VS Code extension to get IntelliSense and syntax highlighting.

Default

As you may guessed, this is the theme used by all Tailwind NG components by default.

Usage from the CDN

This is the easiest and fastest way to use a theme. As it's served by the CDN, your app bundle size nor it loading time will be impacted. For instance, this website uses the default theme.

Add the highlighted line to your index.html file.

@if (copyRec['fromCDN']) { } @else { }

Usage from npm registry

Install the package using your favorite package manager.

@if (copyRec['npm']) { } @else { }

yarn:

@if (copyRec['yarn']) { } @else { }

pnpm:

@if (copyRec['pnpm']) { } @else { }
